title: Tencent likely to sell 2.1% stake in PB Fintech via block deal for Rs 1,610 crore: Report
description: The floor price for the issue is set at Rs 1,660.2 per share, a 4.4% discount to Wednesday's closing price. Tencent, which held a 4.6% stake in the Policybazaar parent company as of June 30, 2024, is reportedly selling its stake.
content: Chinese multinational technology conglomerate Tencent is likely to sell a 2.1% stake in PB Fintech via block deal at an estimated price of Rs 1,610 crore.
cleaned_content: chinese multinational technology conglomerate tencent is likely to sell a <TWO_PERCENT> stake in pb fintech via block deal at an estimated price of rs <ONE_THOUSAND> crore
